document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Melshimber Villa on Grimwald's Way.
document_data.name: Melshimber Villa
document_data.location: [[Grimwald's Way]] & the [[Street of Whispers]], [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Melshimber Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Melshimber]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the north section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] on the northwest corner of the intersection of the [[Street of Whispers]] and [[Grimwald's Way]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The elongated walled estate contained three separate buildings and a garden. Each building was four or five stories tall.
